SspiAuthenticationParameters.summary: Provides parameters used during SSPI authentication.

ctor.summary: Creates an instance of the SspiAuthenticationParameters.
ctor.param: The resource (often the server service principal name).

Resource.summary: Gets the resource (often the server service principal name).

UserId.summary: Gets or sets the user id if available.

DatabaseName.summary: Gets or sets the database name if available.

Password.summary: Gets or sets the password if available.
